Network Name:
``admin_network``




.. note:: This name cannot be modified. This is mandatory for discovery and provisioning of the cluster nodes.
Parameter details: The name of the NIC on which the administrative network is accessible to the OIM.
The 32-bit “mask” used to divide an IP address into subnets and specify the network’s available hosts.
The admin IP address of the OIM server

* The iDRAC  IP address of the OIM server
* Mandatory only if ``idrac_telemetry`` is set to ``true`` and telemetry data needs to be collected.
* This field can be omitted if iDRAC telemetry is not required.
The dynamic range of IPs to be provisioned on target nodes.
